remarks: Closure of scalar product in a closed kernel dual vector space. (Contributed by NM, 20-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lcdlssvscl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcdlssvscl.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdlssvscl.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
lcdlssvscl.r $e |- R = ( Base ` F ) $.
lcdlssvscl.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdlssvscl.v $e |- V = ( Base ` C ) $.
lcdlssvscl.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` C ) $.
lcdlssvscl.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` C ) $.
lcdlssvscl.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcdlssvscl.l $e |- ( ph -> L e. S ) $.
lcdlssvscl.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. R ) $.
lcdlssvscl.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. L ) $.
lcdlssvscl $p |- ( ph -> ( X .x. Y ) e. L ) $.
